content: Hello Mister Heine, thanks for inviting me to see the apartment. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Mary Smith

content: Good day! Thank you for considering my apartment. I believe we can come to an agreement on the rental price. May I ask what you are looking to pay per month for this 25 square meter apartment?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I am looking for 800 Euros per month. Do you have any questions?
name: Mary Smith

content: Thank you for your offer. I understand that you are looking to pay 800 Euros per month for the apartment. However, I believe that we can come to a higher price that would be more beneficial for both of us. May I ask if you are open to negotiating the rental price?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
Yes, I am open to negotiating the rental price. What do you have in mind?

Mary Smith
name: Mary Smith

content: Thank you for your willingness to negotiate. I believe that we can come to an agreement on a rental price that is fair for both of us. May I suggest that we consider a rental price of 900 Euros per month? This price takes into account the value of the apartment and the amenities that it offers. Additionally, it would provide me with a reasonable return on my investment as a landlord. Is this a price that you would be willing to consider?
name: Heinrich Heine
